code: import{server}from'../store';import axios from'axios';export const contactUs=(name,email,message)=>async dispatch=>{try{const config={headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},withCredentials:true};dispatch({type:'contactRequest'});const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(server,"/contact"),{name,email,message},config);dispatch({type:'contactSuccess',payload:data.message});}catch(error){dispatch({type:'contactFail',payload:error.response.data.message});}};export const courseRequest=(name,email,course)=>async dispatch=>{try{const config={headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},withCredentials:true};dispatch({type:'courseRequestRequest'});const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(server,"/courserequest"),{name,email,course},config);dispatch({type:'courseRequestSuccess',payload:data.message});}catch(error){dispatch({type:'courseRequestFail',payload:error.response.data.message});}};
